nodes.text: Keya Durns was the daughter of Professor Jonas Durns. She was known to be beautiful, but icy-eyed and remote. She was skilled in powersuit operations, brawling, and space transport repair, among other things. She was also known to be skilled with a blaster. She joined her father, a group of spacers, and the professional treasure hunter Sig Coven on a successful expedition to find the fables pirate ship Kragg's Fury.
